entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 except minus 1 near Campbell River. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
